issue.title: [Python] Drop Python 3.4 support
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2100](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2100). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
conda-forge has already dropped it, Pandas dropped it in 0.21, we should also think of dropping support for it.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2100?focusedCommentId=16361309) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
If there are no comments against it, I would drop 3.4 after the 0.9 release.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2100?focusedCommentId=16361396) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Sounds good to me

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2100?focusedCommentId=16430745) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
